thread.section_title: Paradise Farm & Tack Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Paradise Farm & Tack | paradisefarmandtack.com
thread.title: Flora Tovar
thread.title_full: Paradise Farm & Tack reviewed by Flora Tovar

author: Flora Tovar
title: Flora Tovar
text:
I made my first order with "Paradise Tack".
I got my order very quick.
Prior to ordering I called the store to ask a few questions about a particular item. They were very helpful and reassured me that if I wasn't happy with the item, that I could return it and get a full refund.
